faq1.title: What is FinanTex?
faq1.answer: FinanTex is a binary options (BO) trading platform launched in 2025. It is operated by an experienced team and incorporates the best features and technologies from existing platforms while introducing new advancements for a seamless trading experience.

faq2.title: Is FinanTex a scam?
faq2.answer: No, traders may experience losses due to improper trading strategies, but FinanTex does not scam users. While the platform offers high-profit potential, investing always carries risks. Traders should be well-prepared and knowledgeable to maximize their earnings.

faq3.title: What is a VIP account used for?
faq3.answer: A VIP account allows participation in the platformâ€™s Affiliate Program, enabling users to earn referral commissions. The registration fee for a VIP account is 100 USDT.

faq4.title: What is the purpose of a demo account?
faq4.answer: A FinanTex demo account comes with $1000 in virtual funds, allowing users to practice trading, gain experience, and develop optimal trading strategies. The demo balance is unlimited but cannot be withdrawn.

faq5.title: How can I earn money on FinanTex?
faq5.answer: Beyond trading market fluctuations, FinanTex offers an Affiliate Program where investors can earn commissions by referring new users to the platform.
